'''Alpha v1.0.1_01''' is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on July 2, 2010,<ref name="date">[[wordofnotch:763147353|Seecret Friday update the third! OooooOOOoo!]] – The Word of Notch, July 2, 2010</ref> to fix a Linux mouse bug.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed a Linux mouse bug.<ref name="date"/>

== Trivia ==
* This is currently the oldest archived version of Alpha.
